text: [Music]
where's Ellen where's Ellen stay where
you come out in the open come out where
I can see you know
let me see you as you really are what do
you want what are you doing we are
repairing our ship to leave your world
we need your help you asked me to help
you how can i when you've kidnapped and
stolen for all I know even murdered we
have a long way to go by nightfall
we will have left your earth you will
not see us until it is time time for
what time to kill time to take over we
are good
then why are you hiding we are not yet
ready to meet in friendship why not
because you would be horrified at the
sight of us had you fallen on our world
it might have been different we
understand more all I understand is that
you've taken my friends captive and now
the girl we hold her hostage as well as
the others keep your people away or we
will destroy them how do I know that
your whole mission here isn't to destroy
all of us stand out in the Sun perhaps
then I can't believe you let us stay
apart the people of your world or if we
come together there will only be
destruction I'd got to see you as you
really are come out or I can't take the
responsibility of protecting you very
well then you asked to see this so you
shall
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
